Introduction.description0: LikeCoin (ERC-20) token migration to the LikeCoin Mainnet is ongoing. If you havenâ€™t transferred your LikeCoin (ERC-20) tokens, you can do it by following the instructions below.
Introduction.description1: LikeCoin chain is build based on Cosmos SDK, all registered LikeCoin users will be given a free Cosmos token wallet bind with the Liker ID. If you have already logged in, it will automatically prefill the next step - Cosmos address for you. If you choose to manually input your Cosmos wallet, please kindly be advised to check your Cosmos wallet address is accurate and correctly filled (ie. Cosmos wallet usually starts with cosmos). Any Cosmos tokens transfer that goes to other non-supported wallet address is more likely to be lost and unable to be retrieved.

message.addressNotMatch: Please use eth address {wallet} for signing

StepPendingTx.doneDescription: New LikeCoin has been transferred to your Cosmos address
